guidance: Connect daily action to ancient rhythm
Notice what the Roj reminds you to see

roj_calendar.hormuz: Dedicated to Ahura Mazda. Grateful for wisdom, seeking knowledge from learned elders.
roj_calendar.bahman: Good Mind. Use intellect wisely, make good choices.
roj_calendar.ardibehest: Best righteousness. Truth, justice, divine law and order, virtue.
roj_calendar.shehrevar: Divine dominion, power, energy. Strong confidence to act righteously.
roj_calendar.spendarmad: Holy devotion. Care for body and mind, kindness and compassion toward others.
roj_calendar.khordaad: Perfection. Strive for excellence in everything.
roj_calendar.amardaad: Immortality. Living righteously so your way of life continues through others.
roj_calendar.dae_pa_adar: Day of the Creator before Adar. Grateful for all blessings of Ahura Mazda.
roj_calendar.adar: Fire. Light and warmth that knowledge brings, pushing away ignorance.
roj_calendar.ava: Water. Thankful for water, responsible by not wasting it.
roj_calendar.khorshed: Sun. Grateful for warmth, light, beautiful sunsets.
roj_calendar.mohor: Moon. Regularity of nature, cosmic order, bestower of luck and destiny.
roj_calendar.tir: Star Tishtraya, the rain-giving star. Grateful for rain after dry summer.
roj_calendar.gosh: Soul of Mother Earth, dedicated to animals. Some abstain from eating meat.
roj_calendar.dae_pa_mehr: Day of the Creator before Mehr. Grateful for all blessings.
roj_calendar.mehr: Light, promise, truth, justice, friendship. Keep your word, be fair, be a true friend.
roj_calendar.sarosh: Intuition, divine voice of conscience. Listen to what guides you toward right action.
roj_calendar.rashne: Truth and judge. Follow the path of truth, aim for fairness.
roj_calendar.fravardin: Remembrance of fravashis of the departed. Honor what they taught through how they lived.
roj_calendar.behram: Success and victory. May your actions manifest achievement.
roj_calendar.raam: Peace and joy. Grateful for blessings, breathe into calm.
roj_calendar.govad: Soft wind. Spend time outdoors, enjoy the breeze and nature.
roj_calendar.dae_pa_din: Day of the Creator before Din. Grateful for all blessings.
roj_calendar.din: Religion. Grateful to carry this ancient faith, apply its teachings daily.
roj_calendar.ashishvangh: Earthly and spiritual riches. Generate wealth honestly, use it charitably.
roj_calendar.ashtad: Truth and justice. Honesty and fairness in all interactions.
roj_calendar.asman: Sky. Spend time enjoying the creations in nature.
roj_calendar.zamyad: Earth. Duty to preserve resources, recycle, conserve water and energy.
roj_calendar.mahraspand: Holy words. Chant prayers with focus, find peace and courage.
roj_calendar.aneran: Endless light, where Ahura Mazda lives. Light associated with goodness and knowledge.
